text:
Actually, I think quite a large percentage of 3DS owners bought this game.

This games needs a demo, as well as DLC. A sequel will not be received well but a DLC campaign (NOT new weapons!) would be the best.

text: +NeatNit This won't happen, but a crossover DLC campaign of Kid Icarus X Bayonetta would really be awesome.

text: God,I love this game. I want my sequel,but Sakurai is a bit...anal about those,and it's not like this game was a huge hit like Smash,so I don't imagine Nintendo will put a lot of pressure on him. I mean,it sold well enough,but not that much.

text:
Chuggaconroy sent me here.

Ok, he didn't but since he loves this theme, I'm sure he would've.

It's an absolute blast, Supra.  Move it to the front of the catalog and play it.

author: johnoliverguy

text: I really hope that you play this soon. The music is great and the characters have a lot of personality. It's fun listening to them have conversations in each level.
author: ThatOne

text: This game is somewhere in my huge backlog pile of games. I've heard a lot of people say it's one of the best and most addicting games on the 3DS once you get used to the controls. The soundtrack alone makes me want to play it, that's for sure. Speaking of the 3DS, the handheld's absolutely on fire with all the quality games releasing on it. I love my XL.
author: SupraDarky

text: I will be getting my 3DS XL soon enough and this game will be one of the first games I will get for it.  I love the soundtrack for this game and it goes to show what great connections Sakurai has with the composers for this game (i.e. Koshiro, Sakuraba, Mitsuda, and others).  Speaking of Magnus, I hope he's a playable character in the new Super Smash Bros game as I think he would make a great fit into that game.
author: Eric C.

text: A modern classic nintendo game.
author: HalberdierV2

text: It's Brawl, but in 3D and with a good Story Mode. Sakurai did his miracle. Play it when you can.
author: Sterfam

text: A gameboy game that isn't Pokemon!
author: David Harris

text: This game is certainly worth playing. Soundtrack is great and the story and dialogue are witty. Controls are hit and miss, but overall it is a great game.
author: Edward

text:
One of the worst thigns ever happened to me was to lose my KIU game pack. 

I absolutely loved this game, I will be purchasing another one soon. 

I also love the music of this game. Special mention to Chapter 6: Dark Pit's theme. Also, "wrath of the initialization bomb", and almost all of the Aurum themes. 

I think this game has one of the best soundtracks out there.
author: Antonio Briceño

text: Get get get this game. Beats StarFox in my view.
